title: Records Request - GTL and smartinmate.com Revenue

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Records Request - GTL and smartinmate.com Revenue
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Can I please request the financial income/financial statements for Lee County and/or the county sheriff's office is receiving From GTL and smartinmate.com . Please provide the last 12 months if records.

There should not be any fees associated pertaining to this request, I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment and/or download link as per Sunshine Law.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Mason C. turner
